Module com.bytefacets.collections
Package com.bytefacets.collections.heap

Class BaseLongHeap

java.lang.Object
com.bytefacets.collections.heap.BaseLongHeap
Direct Known Subclasses:
LongBoolHeap, LongByteHeap, LongCharHeap, LongDoubleHeap, LongFloatHeap, LongGenericHeap, LongIntHeap, LongLongHeap, LongShortHeap, LongStringHeap
public abstract class BaseLongHeap extends Object
Base class for a heap of long.

  • Method Details

    • getComparator

      public LongType.Cmp getComparator()
      The comparator in use for the heap.

    • setComparator

      public void setComparator(LongType.Cmp newComparator)
      Resets the comparator and rebuilds the heap.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the given comparator is null

    • getDefaultKey

      public long getDefaultKey()
      The current default key

    • setDefaultKey

      public void setDefaultKey(long defaultKey)
      Sets a default key on the heap, but can only be called when the heap is empty.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the heap has anything in it already

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the contents of the heap.

    • insert

      public int insert(long key)
      Inserts the key into the heap, returning the value's entry. The entry is a stable reference to the value.

    • removeAt

      public void removeAt(int entry)
      Removes the value at the given entry.
      Throws:
      InvalidEntryException - if the entry was not active in the heap
      RangeCheckException - if the entry was outside the bounds of the underlying array

    • resetKey

      public void resetKey(int entry, long newKey)
      Resets the key for the given entry. This can be useful for timers, which may repeat: the repeat can be accomplished by setting a new time, but the entry will remain stable.

    • getKeyAt

      public long getKeyAt(int entry)
      Returns the key at the given entry. Note this is not range-checked.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if entry is outside the bounds of the underlying array

    • containsKey

      public boolean containsKey(long key)
      Returns true if the key is present in the heap.

    • getFirstEntry

      public int getFirstEntry(long key)
